basics.name: Leonardo Avila
basics.label: Full Stack Developer with over 2 years of experience and more than 1 year in creating programming content for courses and workshops.
basics.summary: IT Technician, currently focused on Full-Stack Web Development. My passion for technology has led me to be self-taught, always seeking to learn and improve my skills.

work.name: Programming School
work.summary: I provide programming courses in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and Java (backend-oriented). The courses I teach are: JavaScript from Scratch and Java for Backend.
highlights: Provided technology training for teenagers and adults.

work.name: Casa del Futuro
work.summary: I provide courses in computer repair and WAN/LAN network configuration. I teach programming in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and Java.
highlights: Provided technology training for teenagers and adults.

work.name: Conectar Lab
work.summary: I teach programming courses in C (Arduino), robotics, and basic electronics for children and teenagers.
highlights: Encouraged interest in technology among young people.

work.name: V° Hipodromo - Godoy Cruz
work.summary: Assembled, maintained, and repaired computers. Configured WAN/LAN networks, subnets, WiFi, and CCTV systems. Supported systems and network management.
highlights: Improved the efficiency and security of the technological infrastructure.

education.institution: Esc. Normal Sup. Gral. San Martin

projects.name: bot-discord
projects.description: Discord bot developed to automate tasks and enhance interaction on Discord servers. Created with the main objective of assisting students at 'Escuela de Programación de Godoy Cruz', managing roles, managing 'Reduced Classrooms', among others. Uses Discord.js and Google APIs.
highlights: Automation of repetitive tasks on Discord.
Student attendance assistance at 'Escuela de Programación de Godoy Cruz'.
Use of Discord.js and Google APIs.

projects.name: wspbot-cdf
projects.description: WhatsApp bot developed to facilitate real-time customer assistance, providing information about the courses/workshops held at Casa del Futuro. Uses the whatsapp-web.js library.

projects.name: JavaScript from Scratch
projects.description: JavaScript from Scratch course with HTML and CSS.
highlights: Practical examples with HTML and CSS.
